metadata.description: Universal Golden Set - all academic domains. Tests Find My Journal across Health, Life, Physical, and Social Sciences.

test_cases.title: The association between overactive bladder and fibromyalgia in women
test_cases.abstract: Overactive bladder is a common syndrome characterized by urinary urgency, with or without incontinence. Fibromyalgia is characterized by widespread pain and central sensitization. We examined 500 women in a cross-sectional study to determine the association between these conditions.

test_cases.title: Novel biomarkers in acute heart failure prognosis
test_cases.abstract: Heart failure is a leading cause of hospitalization. This study evaluates novel cardiac biomarkers including NT-proBNP and troponin for risk stratification in acute heart failure patients admitted to the emergency department.

test_cases.title: Cognitive behavioral therapy for treatment-resistant depression
test_cases.abstract: Treatment-resistant depression affects approximately 30% of patients with major depressive disorder. We conducted a randomized controlled trial comparing CBT augmentation with medication optimization in 200 patients.

test_cases.title: Growth hormone treatment in pediatric Down syndrome
test_cases.abstract: To analyze the safety and efficacy of growth hormone treatment in Down syndrome pediatric patients. We performed a systematic review of randomized controlled trials assessing GH treatment outcomes.

test_cases.title: Caring babies: Concern for others in distress during infancy
test_cases.abstract: Concern for distressed others is a highly valued human capacity. This study examines the early ontogeny of empathic concern in infants aged 8 to 16 months. We observed behavioral responses to simulated distress.

test_cases.title: The impact of quantitative easing on asset prices
test_cases.abstract: This paper examines the effects of unconventional monetary policy on equity and bond markets. Using panel data from G7 countries during 2008-2020, we analyze transmission mechanisms.

test_cases.title: Social media and political polarization in democracies
test_cases.abstract: We analyze the role of algorithmic curation in creating ideological echo chambers on social media platforms. Using survey data and network analysis, we examine how filter bubbles affect political discourse.

test_cases.title: The effectiveness of gamification in online learning
test_cases.abstract: This meta-analysis examines the impact of gamification elements on student engagement and learning outcomes in online educational platforms across K-12 and higher education.

test_cases.title: Attention Is All You Need: Transformer Architecture
test_cases.abstract: We propose a new simple network architecture, the Transformer, based solely on attention mechanisms, dispensing with recurrence and convolutions entirely. Experiments on machine translation show superior quality.

test_cases.title: Quantum entanglement and teleportation experiments
test_cases.abstract: We demonstrate a novel approach to quantum teleportation using entangled photon pairs. The experiment achieves fidelity above 95% for quantum state transfer across optical fiber links of 100km.

test_cases.title: Seismic analysis of high-rise buildings with damping systems
test_cases.abstract: This study analyzes the performance of reinforced concrete structures during earthquakes using finite element analysis. We examine structural damping systems and their effectiveness in high-rise buildings.

test_cases.title: Metal-organic frameworks for carbon capture applications
test_cases.abstract: We report the synthesis of a novel MOF with exceptional CO2 adsorption capacity. The framework exhibits high selectivity for CO2 over N2 under ambient conditions, making it promising for industrial carbon capture.

test_cases.title: Deep learning approaches for solving partial differential equations
test_cases.abstract: We present neural network methods for approximating solutions to PDEs. Physics-informed neural networks combine data-driven learning with physical constraints for improved accuracy.

test_cases.title: CRISPR-Cas9 precision genome editing in human cells
test_cases.abstract: We demonstrate programmable genome editing using the CRISPR-Cas9 system in human cell lines. The approach enables targeted modification of disease-causing mutations with high efficiency and specificity.

test_cases.title: Climate change effects on coral reef ecosystems
test_cases.abstract: Rising ocean temperatures are causing widespread coral bleaching. This study examines the resilience of reef ecosystems in the Pacific and their capacity for recovery under various warming scenarios.

test_cases.title: Drought-resistant crop varieties and food security
test_cases.abstract: Using 30 years of field trial data, we analyze the performance of drought-resistant wheat and maize varieties across Sub-Saharan Africa. Results inform strategies for climate adaptation in agriculture.
